result.execSummary:
The defendant Steven Michael SIEDSCHLAG was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Burglary-Building or Dwelling, a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.10(1m)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
To Manitowoc Heating and Refrigeration c/o Terry Welnicke at 211 N. 10th Street, Manitowoc, WI.
Restitution is to be paid at a minimum rate of $50.00 per month.
Maintain fulltime employment, schooling or a combination of both.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Submit to random urine screens and pay for same.

Provide DNA sample and pay the surcharge.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

No contact with Manitowoc Heating and Refrigeration.

timeConds.notes: Under the Huber Law, to commence immediately upon completion of the condition time imposed on 15 CF 235.

Defendant in custody.
Information filed.  Copy served.
Not guilty pleas entered.  Jury calendar.
Settlement conference with D.A. is set for 07-16-15 at 2:30 p.m.
Plea date is set for 09-24-15 at 1:30 p.m.
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.  
Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.   Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 3 for further proceedings.   Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.   
Arraignment is set for 07-01-15 at 3:30 p.m.  
Court sets bail at $1,500.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that defendant must report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release and defendant is to have no contact with Manitowoc Heating and Refrigeration.   Defendant refused to sign.   Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
